name: DEAD ARMOUR
description:
DEAD ARMOUR  was created for Caltrop Core Jam 2.

The game sees PCs defend the remnants of a ruined city from an invasion force that seeks to annihilate everything in its path.

The game uses Caltrop Core as its foundation, but it's rather experimental in its design. It is made for people who like the imagination and emotion of table-top role-playing games and the structure and accessible strategy of board games.

This release (version 0.9) is an ashcan/play-test version. 

If you play this game, please tell me how it went in the comments below.

If there is enough interest, this game will be updated and improved upon. No matter how far that process goes, it will remain free or pay-what-you-want and published under a creative commons license.
